name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Group or Close Similar Tabs - Close New Tabs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly combine tabs by domain into groups and close same domain tabs. Simplify your browsing experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension offers a seamless tab management solution by introducing the innovative features of tab group creation and deletion. 
With just a click on the domain name listed in the extension, all tabs sharing the same domain are effortlessly combined into a convenient tab group, eliminating clutter and providing quick access to related content. 
Similarly, closing multiple tabs belonging to a specific domain is simplified with the 'X' icon, allowing for efficient deletion and decluttering of your browsing workspace. 

Enjoy a streamlined browsing experience with Tab Organizer Plus
